document_data.name: Favor of Shaundakul
document_data.mainbody: '''''Favor of Shaundakul''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Shaundakul]], enabling them to create a beneficial event during a trying time.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a beneficial event during an otherwise trying time. The spell would only function out in the wild when traveling.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the caster's [[holy symbol]] to cast.
